proposal: Diving into the world of Oxdrop, where Web3 meets the charm of Oxford (and a touch of Cambridge), it's clear you're crafting a unique blend of app store and social network. With 134 holders in the ETH network, congrats on building a community that's as diverse as your project's vision! Imagine enhancing this ecosystem with our DEX for a tailored trading experience or a community-driven lottery - all while keeping it as simple as entering your full name. Let's blend our tools with your vision, creating something neither Oxford nor Cambridge could have predicted.
